explanation: [0-0] A purple grinding wheel is fixed on a bench vise, with a white grinding wheel above it. The text "GRINDER FIGHT!" is displayed in white letters on a red background.

[0-9] Next, the white grinding wheel starts to move downward, slowly approaching the high-speed rotating purple grinding wheel below. As the two grinding wheels come into contact, they start to shrink, generating a large amount of smoke. Then the smoke dissipates, and the grinding wheels gradually stop rotating.
